text: Margarita Diéguez Armas is a Mexican diplomat, and a former Ambassador of Mexico to the United Nations and Chairman of UNICEF. She has served as Mexico's Ambassador to Tanzania, the OPANAL, Bolivia and the Netherlands. From 1989 to 1992 she was Mexico's Ambassador to the United Nations. She has also served as Director of Multilateral Relations in the Secretariat of Foreign Affairs. She was Chairman of the UNICEF Executive Board at the international level from 1989 to 1990.Officers of the UNICEF Executive Board 1946–2014, UNICEFExecutive Board, UNICEF ==References== Category:Chairmen and Presidents of UNICEF Category:Mexican women ambassadors Category:Mexican officials of the United Nations Category:Permanent Representatives of Mexico to the United Nations Category:Ambassadors to Tanzania Category:Ambassadors of Mexico to the Netherlands Category:Ambassadors to Bolivia
title: Margarita Diéguez Armas
